chunk:
Heritage Store Facial Toner, Rosewater (2020 formulation)

Brand: Heritage Store

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: PURIFIED WATER*, GLYCERIN (VEGETABLE), SODIUM PCA, SODIUM HYALURONATE (HYALURONIC ACID), ORGANIC ALOE VERA (ALOE BARBADENSIS) LEAF JUICE, POTASSIUM SORBATE AND HYDROESSENTIAL ROSE (ROSA DAMASCENA).
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
